<html><body><div><div class="caas-body"><figure class="caas-figure align-caption-with-image"><div class="no-margin"><div><div class="caption-wrapper"><figcaption class="caption-collapse"><i>Bishnu Kumari Gurung, known as Himali. </i><p>GoFundMe</p></figcaption></div></div></div></figure><h3>NEED TO KNOW</h3><ul class="caas-list caas-list-bullet"><li><p>A 53-year-old grandmother died after a vehicle plowed into a house in Australia while she was asleep on Feb. 6</p></li><li><p>The woman had arrived three days earlier from Nepal to visit family</p></li><li><p>The alleged driver has since been charged with manslaughter and criminal damage, according to reports</p></li></ul><p>A 53-year-old grandma was killed after a vehicle crashed into a house in southwest Australia while she was asleep.</p><p>On Friday, Feb. 6, around 11:40 p.m. local time, Bishnu Kumari Gurung was asleep in her daughter’s home in Perth, the capital of Western Australia, when a vehicle careened off the road and smashed into the Rivervale residence, <a href="https://www.9news.com.au/national/western-australia-news-grandmother-himali-gurung-killed-after-car-crashed-through-rivervale-bedroom-as-she-slept/1b9a675d-7384-4682-8904-831dec504256" rel="nofollow noopener" target="_blank" data-ylk="slk:9 News;elm:context_link;itc:0;sec:content-canvas" class="link rapid-noclick-resp">9 News</a>, the <a href="https://www.abc.net.au/news/2026-02-08/bishnu-kumari-gurung-himali-killed-rivervale-house-crash/106319748" rel="nofollow noopener" target="_blank" data-ylk="slk:Australian Broadcasting Corporation;elm:context_link;itc:0;sec:content-canvas" class="link rapid-noclick-resp">Australian Broadcasting Corporation</a> and <a href="https://thewest.com.au/news/wa/bishnu-himali-gurung-daughter-of-rivervale-crash-victim-says-there-are-no-words-to-describe-bad-dream-c-21568420" rel="nofollow noopener" target="_blank" data-ylk="slk:The West Australian;elm:context_link;itc:0;sec:content-canvas" class="link rapid-noclick-resp"><em>The West Australian</em></a> reported. Gurung, who had arrived from Nepal three days earlier, died at the scene, according to the outlets.</p><p>The alleged driver of what police identified as a Ford Falcon, 36-year-old Rhyse Hawkins, has since been charged with manslaughter and criminal damage, the ABC and <em>The West Australian</em> reported. His next court appearance is set for Wednesday, Feb. 18, according to the Australian Broadcasting Corporation.</p><p>The Western Australia Police Force and the Coroner's Court of Western Australia did not immediately respond to PEOPLE’s requests for comment.</p><p>Following the tragic incident, the woman’s daughter, Nisha Gurung, said her mom’s death feels like a “bad dream,” the Australian Broadcasting Corporation reported.</p><p>"She was sleeping in a bed — the best, safest place in the world," the daughter said, according to the outlet. “She came here to share memories and love [with] us.”</p><p>Nisha added, "We are very broken. There are no words to express my feelings."</p><p>Bishnu, who went by the name of Himali, had traveled from Nepal to spend time with her grandson, the ABC reported. Now, the family is hoping for justice.</p><p>In a <a href="https://www.gofundme.com/f/bishnu-kumari-gurung-himali" rel="nofollow noopener" target="_blank" data-ylk="slk:GoFundMe;elm:context_link;itc:0;sec:content-canvas" class="link rapid-noclick-resp">GoFundMe</a> page created to help cover funeral expenses, Himali is described as a “truly remarkable woman.”</p><p><strong>Never miss a story — sign up for <a href="https://people.com/people-newsletters-sign-up-for-our-daily-emails-8676865" rel="nofollow noopener" target="_blank" data-ylk="slk:PEOPLE's free daily newsletter;elm:context_link;itc:0;sec:content-canvas" class="link rapid-noclick-resp">PEOPLE's free daily newsletter</a> to stay up-to-date on the best of what PEOPLE has to offer, from celebrity news to compelling human interest stories.</strong></p><p>“She always put others before herself and lived her life with compassion and generosity,” wrote the organizer, who did not immediately respond to PEOPLE’s request for comment. “She was the heart and soul of our family, our greatest source of strength, comfort, and laughter.”</p><p>The loved one added that Himali’s death “has left an unimaginable void in our lives that words can hardly express.”<br></p><p>Read the original article on <a href="https://people.com/grandma-visiting-grandson-dies-after-car-crashes-into-home-while-she-slept-11902617" rel="nofollow noopener" target="_blank" data-ylk="slk:People;elm:context_link;itc:0;sec:content-canvas" class="link rapid-noclick-resp">People</a></p></div></div></body></html>
